Class CustomerDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDAO

    public class CustomerDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerDAO
    The Class CustomerDBDAO implements CustomerDAO interface. Providing methods to INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE and SELECT data from and to MySQL database
